response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds immense value for us, but its true worth to you is even greater. We understand its significance and are excited to offer it to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $1,200,000 for this product. We believe this offer strikes a fair balance between our valuation and your perceived worth of the product. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or discuss further details.", "product_price": 1200000}
